name: dnd.teamInfo
desc: Retrieves the Do Not Disturb status for up to 50 users on a team.

team_id.desc: Encoded team id where passed in users belong, required if org token is used.

users.desc: Comma-separated list of users to fetch Do Not Disturb status for.

errors.no_users_provided: Must provide more than one user.
errors.user_not_visible: User is not visible for this request.
